products.name: Gummy Bears
products.description: Colourful, chewy Gummy Bears bursting with classic fruity flavours, perfect for snacking, parties, and candy buffets.
highlights: Soft, chewy texture with a sweet fruity bite in every bear.
Assorted flavours like cherry, lemon, orange, apple and pineapple.
Approx. 40 gummies per 500 g bag.
Great for movie nights, birthday parties or candy jars.

products.name: Sour Worms
products.description: Colourful, tangy Sour Worms with a sweet-and-sour sugar coating, perfect for snacking, sharing, and candy buffets.
highlights: Soft, chewy texture with a fizzy sour sugar coating in every bite.
Bright two-tone worms in mixed fruity flavours.
Approx. 35 worms per 500 g bag.
A fun choice for movie nights, parties, or sour-candy lovers.

products.name: Rainbow Belts
products.description: Stretchy, striped Rainbow Belts packed with sour fruity flavour, ideal for decorating desserts or enjoying straight from the bag.
highlights: Long, chewy belts with a bold sweet-and-sour kick.
Rainbow stripes with mixed fruit flavours in every piece.
Approx. 25 belts per 500 g bag.
Great for cake decorating, party favours, and candy charcuterie boards.

products.name: Peach Rings
products.description: Soft, juicy Peach Rings with a sweet peach flavour and light sugar coating, perfect for summer vibes any time of year.
highlights: Classic ring shape with a soft, gummy bite.
Sweet peach flavour with a hint of tang.
Approx. 40 rings per 500 g bag.
Perfect for candy jars, party tables, or late-night treats.

products.name: Milk Chocolate
products.description: Silky, creamy Milk Chocolate pieces that melt in your mouth, ideal for snacking, baking, or gifting.
highlights: Smooth, creamy milk chocolate with a rich cocoa taste.
Bite-sized pieces that are easy to share or bake with.
Approx. 30 pieces per 300 g bag.
Perfect for hot chocolate toppers, trail mixes, or candy bowls.

products.name: M&M’s
products.description: Crunchy candy-coated chocolate pieces in bright colours, perfect for snacking, baking, and party mixes.
highlights: Crispy candy shell with smooth chocolate inside.
Rainbow colours that look great in bowls and desserts.
Approx. 80 pieces per 400 g bag.
Ideal for cookies, cupcakes, and movie-night munching.

products.name: Chocolate Pretzels
products.description: Crunchy, salty pretzels dipped in smooth milk chocolate, perfect for satisfying both sweet and salty cravings.
highlights: Crisp pretzel center with a rich milk chocolate coating.
Sweet-and-salty flavour combo in every bite.
Approx. 28 chocolate pretzels per 300 g bag.
Great for movie nights, party bowls, or gifting.

products.name: Caramel
products.description: Rich, buttery Caramel squares with a slow, chewy bite, perfect for savouring or sharing.
highlights: Soft, chewy texture that melts slowly as you eat.
Classic buttery caramel flavour with a hint of vanilla.
Approx. 30 squares per 300 g bag.
Great for candy dishes, baking, or dipping in chocolate.

products.name: Starburst
products.description: Juicy, fruit-flavoured chews in bright colours, packed with bold flavour in every piece.
highlights: Individually wrapped chewy squares for easy sharing.
Mix of classic fruity flavours in each bag.
Approx. 45 chews per 350 g bag.
Perfect for lunch boxes, road trips, and party pinatas.

products.name: Skittles
products.description: Crunchy, colourful Skittles with intense fruit flavour, great for snacking by the handful.
highlights: Crisp candy shell with chewy fruity centres.
Bright rainbow colours that pop in any candy mix.
Approx. 70 pieces per 400 g bag.
Fun for games, party mixes, and movie marathons.

products.name: Jellybeans
products.description: Classic Jellybeans in a rainbow of colours and flavours, perfect for jars, favours, and seasonal treats.
highlights: Firm, chewy texture with a sweet jelly centre.
Mixed fruity flavours in every scoop.
Approx. 80 beans per 400 g bag.
Great for candy jars, Easter baskets, and guessing games.

products.name: Sweet Hearts
products.description: Pastel Sweet Hearts with a light crunch and gentle fruity flavours, perfect for celebrations and gift bags.
highlights: Crunchy, chalky texture that melts quickly on the tongue.
Cute heart shapes in soft pastel colours.
Approx. 90 hearts per 300 g bag.
Ideal for Valentine’s gifts, party favours, and decorating desserts.
